title: Blair Adams // 94
description:
In 1996, a 31-year-old man fled Canada in fear someone was trying to kill him. Days later, he was found dead in the United States surrounded by money of different currencies. So, what happened to this man? This is the murder of Blair Adams. Advertising Inquiries: https://redcircle.com/brands Privacy & Opt-Out: https://redcircle.com/privacy
